Dear Valued Customer,

We are currently experiencing a service disruption affecting [specific features/services].

**What's Happening:**
{{IMPACT_SUMMARY}}

This issue is caused by an outage at one of our third-party service providers. We are in active communication with them and monitoring their progress closely.

**What's Affected:**
- [Feature/Service 1]
- [Feature/Service 2]
- [Feature/Service 3]

**What's Working:**
- [Unaffected features]
- [Alternative access methods if available]

**Current Status:**
{{CURRENT_STATUS}}

**Expected Resolution:**
Our vendor estimates service will be restored by {{ETA_RESOLUTION}}. We will provide updates every [frequency] or sooner if the situation changes.

**What You Can Do:**
[Workarounds or alternative options if available]

**Next Update:** {{NEXT_UPDATE}}

**Status Page:** {{STATUS_PAGE_URL}}

We apologize for this disruption and appreciate your patience as we work with our vendor to resolve this issue.

Thank you,
[Company Name] Team

templates.name: Payment Provider Outage - Customer Notice (S1)
templates.subject: Payment Processing Temporarily Unavailable
templates.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We want to inform you that payment processing is temporarily unavailable due to an issue with our payment provider.

**What's Affected:**
- Credit card payments
- [Other payment methods if applicable]

**What's NOT Affected:**
- Your existing service/access continues uninterrupted
- Your account and billing information remain secure
- [Alternative payment methods if available]

**Current Status:**
{{CURRENT_STATUS}}

Our payment provider is actively working to resolve this issue. We expect payment processing to resume by {{ETA_RESOLUTION}}.

**What This Means for You:**
- If you were trying to make a payment, please try again later
- Scheduled automatic payments may be delayed
- No late fees will be applied due to this outage
- Your service will not be interrupted

**Alternative Options:**
[If applicable: wire transfer, check, alternative payment processor]

**Next Update:** {{NEXT_UPDATE}}

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

Best regards,
[Company Name] Team

**Questions?** Contact support: {{CONTACT_POINT}}

templates.subject: Service Performance Notice - {{INCIDENT_NAME}}
templates.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We want to inform you of a performance issue affecting some features of our service.

**What's Happening:**
{{IMPACT_SUMMARY}}

This is due to performance issues at one of our third-party service providers. We are working closely with them to resolve this.

**What You Might Experience:**
- Slower than normal response times
- Intermittent timeouts
- [Other symptoms]

**What's NOT Affected:**
- [Core features that are working normally]
- Your data remains secure and accessible

**Current Status:**
{{CURRENT_STATUS}}

**Expected Resolution:**
{{ETA_RESOLUTION}}

**What We're Doing:**
- Monitoring the situation closely
- Working with our vendor to expedite resolution
- Implementing temporary optimizations where possible

**What You Can Do:**
- [Workarounds or tips if available]
- Avoid [specific actions that might timeout]
- Retry failed operations after a few minutes

**Next Update:** {{NEXT_UPDATE}}

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

Best regards,
[Company Name] Team

**Status Page:** {{STATUS_PAGE_URL}}
